video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (08) Developing Advanced Taxonomy Scenarios in&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Get explanations on the why and how of leveraging the managed metadata service and creating taxonomies from a provider-hosted SharePoint app, and learn the basics of creating termsets and adding terms&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (07) Deep Dive into Business Connectivity&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Explore advanced scenarios for developing apps that use external content types. [01:00] - Overview[10:10] - App-Level External Content Types[26:31] - Hybrid Business Connectivity Services[34:35] -&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (06) Deep Dive into Search Scenario in Office&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Examine advanced scenarios for developing search-based apps in SharePoint Online. [00:51] - Overview[05:08] - Search Building Blocks[16:05] - Extending Search Center[37:25] - Search Based Apps

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (05) SharePoint 2013 Remote Event Receivers
video:video.video:description: Take a look at the architecture of Remote Event Receivers, and see how to use them in a provider-hosted SharePoint app. Learn how to configure debugging sessions so that you can trigger the Office 365&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (04) Deep Dive into SharePoint Lists with CSOM&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Find out how to make the most of the Client-side Object Model (CSOM) from a provider-hosted SharePoint app and how to optimize your CSOM code. See demos of the CSOM programming required to create site&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (03) Deep Dive into SharePoint Lists with REST&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Learn how to use the SharePoint REST API to read and write to SharePoint lists. Hear why the REST API is a great tool for developers who may not have access to one of the client-side object model&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (02) Deep Dive into SharePoint Lists for Data&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Examine how to create and use lists from a SharePoint provider-hosted app, and see demos on various ways to create lists using both declarative XML elements and procedural C# code. Learn about the use&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Deep Dive Building Blocks and Services of SharePoint: (01) Developing Advanced Workflow Scenarios&#8230;
video:video.video:description: Explore advanced scenarios for developing workflow-powered apps for SharePoint in Office 365 with Visual Studio. Learn why your customers should consider putting a workflow in an app for SharePoint,&#8230;
